intro: Psychotria bontocensis, commonly known as the Bontoc psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, typically in lowland forests. The species is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and potential ecological significance in its native habitat.
